logicName: 需求实体编辑视图（展示）_表单

editorParams.TITLE: name
editorParams.PARSESCRIPT: value?.replace(/@{[^,]*,"name":"(.*?)"}/g,"@$1").replace(/@{[^,]*,name=(.*?)}/g,"@$1").replaceAll(/\#\{(\".+?\":\".+?\"),\"icon\":\"((.|[\t\r\f\n\s])+?)\"\}/g,(x, value, icon) => { const item = JSON.parse("{" + value + "}"); const tempIcon = icon.trim(); const params = JSON.stringify(item); return `${tempIcon} ${item.identifier} ${item.name}`;}).replaceAll(/\{\"\emoji\":\"(.+?)\"\}/g,(x, emoji) => {const tempVal = decodeURIComponent(atob(emoji)); return `${tempVal}`})

getPSDEUIActionGroup.name: 附件表格操作列（仅下载）

getPSDEFDGroupLogics.name: 表单成员[grouppanel2][面板显示]逻辑

editorParams.SCRIPTCODE: data.content?.replace(/@{[^,]*,"name":"(.*?)"}/g,"@$1").replace(/@{[^,]*,name=(.*?)}/g,"@$1").replaceAll(/\#\{(\".+?\":\".+?\"),\"icon\":\"((.|[\t\r\f\n\s])+?)\"\}/g, (x, value, icon) => {const item = JSON.parse("{" + value + "}"); const tempIcon = icon.trim(); return `${tempIcon} ${item.identifier} ${item.name}`;}).replaceAll(/\{\"\emoji\":\"(.+?)\"\}/g,(x, emoji) => {const tempVal = decodeURIComponent(atob(emoji)); return `${tempVal}`})

getPSPanelItemGroupLogics.name: 面板成员[container3][面板显示]逻辑
